description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `idLocale` in method `Spryker\Zed\CategoryImage\Dependency\Facade\CategoryImageToLocaleBridge::getLocaleById()`.
Bridges: Method `getLocaleById()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer;` signature.
